text: hi everyone is Ellen here today I will
be making Bangkok a vietnamese small
pancake it's a very popular dish in the
southern coastal province of bari boom
pow boom pow is the nearest beach city
to Saigon therefore many people working
in Saigon come here to spend their
weekends and besides seafood this city
is well known for offering many great
stores of Bangkok I was involved out a
few months ago and had a chance to visit
this history which is well known for
selling the most delicious Bangkok in
the city when you enter the place the
first thing you're gonna see is two huge
mini pancake pants that look quite like
shallow cupcake pans the pans are set on
wood-burning stoves and whole Bangkok
sizzling means frying oil a rather mini
pancake pans are about 10 people working
really hammer nicely in an assembling
life firstly the batter is poured into
the molds then one shrimp is added on
top of each pancake and then each
pancake will have is all it to cover
what the mini pancakes are from and
cooked they are transferred to the other
pan and fry it for the second time it's
really hot here in southern Vietnam and
despite the numerous fans working on
full speed
the atmosphere is rather hectic MSA on
weekends and public holidays many
tourists and working people in Ho Chi
Minh City will travel all the way here
just to enjoy a plate of Bangkok
therefore you can expect really long
queues on those days one serving portion
of these mini pancakes consists of
around 10 pieces sitting on a plate with
a generous tinker of growl dried shrimps
and scallion oil
if you observe carefully you can see
that they use really a lot of vegetable
oil in the pan and that is definitely
one of the tricks to get the pancakes
crispy because of the size of the
pancake this can be served as a snack or
a light meal if you are not hungry you
can just eat one or two but I'm telling
you once you start is really difficult
to stop uncock is served with a platter
of fresh herbs and mustard leaves and
letters as wrappers some sweet and sour
pickle green papayas you just wrap
everything in the leaf and then dip in
the dipping sauce and self
mm so
fresh and yummy let's try making this at
home recipes firstly you want to peel
and devein the shrimp season with some
salt and pepper some wings garlic or
shallots if you can get all of this one
cup flour mix that's great otherwise
just mix rice flour with cornstarch the
basic recipe is just as simple as mixing
flour with water but they are actually
many tricks and secrets behind making
the perfect crispy it's fluffy and cut
for the liquid you can just use water
but using club soda or a mixture of beer
and water we make the mini pancakes
fluffier that's because the small
bubbles in the beer or club soda will
add a lightness to the batter combine
the flour with the liquid and then stir
well until smooth if you want the bun
car to have a nice yellow color add
about a teaspoon of turmeric powder it
normally comes with the package if you
buy the Bangkok Melnick's
another secret in making the perfect 1
cup butter it is use left over cooked
rice and coconut milk just blend a cup
of leftover cooked rice go moy with a
cup of coconut milk until smooth the
blended leftover cooked rice makes the
mini pancakes fluffier and helps
maintain the crispness just combine
together and let the batter rest for at
least 30 minutes oh and don't forget to
add about half a teaspoon of salt into
the batter you can get these mini
pancake pants at Vietnamese markets or
online I will put the links below where
you can buy it the pan also plays an
important role in making the pancakes
crispy if you have the choice choose the
pans with thick bottom especially those
make of cast iron heat a generous amount
of vegetable oil until nice and hot then
pour the butter into the forms and
quickly add a shroom on top of each
pancake so it can stick to the batter
and will not fall off easily if you want
you can stir-fry the shrooms first but
then they could be a little bit
overcooked after frying cover the lid
and let this
fry for about three to five minutes
checking occasionally when they are
fully cooked and turn golden brown check
out and let them rest on a paper towel
to remove the excess oil arrange them
nicely on a serving plate together with
some fresh herbs like mint or coriander
and mustard leaves or lettuce as a
wrapper some pickled daikon and radish
or some green papaya if you have an
above applied dipping fee sauce to serve
place a piece of mustard leaf or a
lettuce in the palm of your hand put a
small pancake on top together with some
herbs and the pickles roll it up dip in
the sauce and enjoy let me give it a try
it's so fluffy
crispy and yummy in my home city in
Danang we also have a similar dish
called mankind it's also made in the
same form and rather than shrooms they
also use other toppings like squid other
seafood or quail eggs look at the amount
of oil she has in the pan is really a
lot normally at home most of us don't
have the courage to put that much oil in
the pan while making these pancakes
that's one of the reasons why homemade
mini pancakes are not as crispy and
those at the stores another thing that
they do at the shop and we don't is that
they fry the pancakes two times when the
mini pancakes are formed they change it
to the other pan and that is a very
crucial trick to get the mini pancakes
really crispy in Danang bangbang is
served with some shredded fresh greens
and shredded green papayas we just eat
it like that on it all without any
wrapping mmm this super crispy and
delicious if you decide to give this
recipe a try don't forget to take a
photo of your food and upload to
Instagram Facebook or Google+ with hash
tag Helen recipes I would love to see
your photos and have them features in my
next videos just like these awesome
dishes if you like this video don't
forget
click like and subscribe to my channel
